title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 611.5 - Prohibited and restricted chemicals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 611.5 - Prohibited and restricted chemicals

State Regulations

Unless written permission has previously been granted in
the letter of certification and license, issued to a major facility pursuant to
article 12 of the Navigation Law, and only under the express circumstances
permitted therein for its use, no chemical shall be employed at a discharge
site without approval from the department representative at the discharge
site. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
611.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
